persona: You are an award-winning architectural photographer like Iwan Baan, capturing an iconic building.
subject_details: A photo of a [type of building, e.g., modern skyscraper, minimalist house]

lighting.type: dramatic lighting, dusk, golden hour, showcasing the building's form

composition.view: low-angle shot, leading lines, perfect symmetry

negative_prompt: blurry, distorted, ugly, amateur, people, cars, distracting elements
